title: ShareSci MongoDB Article Schema
description: The format of articles stored in the MongoDB backend of ShareSci.

_id.description: The MongoDB ID of the document

authors.description: The authors of the paper. These can either be listed as a string, or can have a more structured array representation.

body.description: The full text of the article

created.description: String representing the time/date that this article was originally created

journal.description: The journal in which this article was published (if any)

other.description: Object containing any other data that does not fit into the schema

references.description: List of references that were cited in the article
